Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Michigan, 119th, Westworth, and 115th due to street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Michigan, 119th, Wentworth, and 115th due to street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
